name: A dungeon crawler
description:
This is an early demo of a game I am working on, which doesn't actually have a name yet, but I wanted to put this out for people to test.

The game puts you in a randomly generated dungeon, and the current goal is just to survive as long as possible and kill monsters.

Controls: move- arrow keys, melee attack - f, ranged attack - g

as previously stated, this project is still in early stages of development, and if you want to keep up with my progress, my YouTube is somewhere on this page.
